title: Queues for fuel even on Poya Day (17)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); People have been queuing for fuel since Thursday (17) morning, despite it being a public holiday.
According to the News 1st Correspondents, people are waiting in queues until the filling stations are open fpr fuel distribution.
News 1st Correspondent svisited Colombo on Thursday (17) morning to inquire about the situation in Colombo.

A chaotic situation was experienced at the Pannipitiya filling station at around 10 p.m on Wednesday (16) night, people who were in line since morning were not given fuel after 8 PM as the filling station had run out of fuel.
